sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm.js"; import CurrentUserContext from '../contexts/CurrentUserContext'; function EditProfilePopup(props) { console.log const currentUser = React.useContext(CurrentUserContext); // Подписываемся на контекст CurrentUserContext const [name, setName] = React.useState(''); const [description, setDescription ] = React.useState(''); return( ) } export default EditProfilePopup;
